content.raw: Yeah, I think there’s some underlying issue…  I’ve gotten multiple Ogre related crashes, mostly referencing `hlm_lights_point` but sometimes giving other error messages.  I’ll continue running in gdb and hopefully be able to catch more stacktraces of the other Ogre crashes.
content.html: Yeah, I think there’s some underlying issue… I’ve gotten multiple Ogre related crashes, mostly referencing hlm_lights_point but sometimes giving other error messages. I’ll continue running in gdb and hopefully be able to catch more stacktraces of the other Ogre crashes.
